messages.content: Thank you for contacting Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I have your name please?
My name is Chloe. And I'm really frustrated right now.
I'm sorry to hear that, Chloe. How can I assist you today?
I've been having issues with the quality of your Purina Pro Plan. The last few bags I've bought have been terrible.
I apologize for the inconvenience, Chloe. Could you please describe the issues you've been experiencing?
The kibble is inconsistent in size, and my dog refuses to eat it. This has never happened before.
That sounds very frustrating. We take quality issues seriously. Could you provide me with the batch number and the store where you purchased the product?
I bought it from PetSmart, and the batch number is 5678XYZ. I just want some consistency in what I'm feeding my dog!
Thank you for the information, Chloe. I'll escalate this issue to our quality control team immediately. We can also offer you a replacement or a refund. Which would you prefer?
I'd prefer a refund. I've already switched to another brand.
I understand, Chloe. I'll process the refund for you. You should see it reflected in your account within 5-7 business days. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that's all. Just make sure this doesn’t happen again.
I assure you, Chloe, we are taking your feedback seriously. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
